attributes.action: Legislate The Resale Of Concert And Event Tickets At Amount Above The Face Value
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have been interviewed already by my local radio station - RADIO WAVE in Blackpool

There are 4 great lads looking forward to doing a tour this year, but thousands of fans (like me) who are gutted

IF YOU ARE A HUGE TAKE THAT FAN AND WERE UNABLE TO BUY TICKETS BECAUSE OF MONEY GRABBING EBAYERS AND ONLINE TICKET COMPANIES, HELP ME MAKE A STAND AND LET YOUR VOICE BE HEARD 

IF YOU AGREE WITH ME THEN PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION.

This has been going on too long where people are allowed to buy tickets, only to sell them on at vastly infalted prices to make a quick buck. It is unfair and stops genuine fans from being able to purchase tickets.

Please sign this petition and let's get something done about it.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT.

 

BY THE WAY: GARY, JASON, HOWARD AND MARK - If you happen to have a spare couple of tickets - throw them this way

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters, they make the petition very hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
